main.controller

Class SearchController

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.controller.SearchController

  • public class SearchController
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages search and generates search result based on JSON data.

    Version:
    1.0

      • getSearchResult

        public static UserController getSearchResult(int index)
        Getter for searchResults.
        Parameters:
        index - Specifies position of the required searchResults.
        Returns:
        UserController at the specified position in searchResults.

      • setUpSearchController

        public void setUpSearchController(int category,
                                  java.lang.String query,
                                  boolean repoUsed,
                                  java.lang.String repoBoundOperator,
                                  int repoBoundNumber,
                                  boolean followersUsed,
                                  java.lang.String followersBoundOperator,
                                  int followersBoundNumber)

        Sets the parameters as the attributes of search. Generates search results.

        Parameters:
        category - Restricts search into certain fields.
        query - Contains keyword used for searching.
        repoUsed - Determines whether the repository filter will be used in searching or not.
        repoBoundOperator - Determines what mathematical operator used to filter repositories.
        repoBoundNumber - Determines limit of the repository filter.
        followersUsed - Determines the usage of followers filter in searching.
        followersBoundOperator - Determines what mathematical operator used to filter followers.
        followersBoundNumber - Determines limit of the followers filter.

      • setSearchResults

        public void setSearchResults()
        Setter for searchResults.

        Generates searchResults based on JSON data from searchUrl in search.
